<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Haunting Hymn](/Spells.aspx?ID=1999)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=550" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=697" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 246 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

You echo a jarring hymn that only creatures in the area can hear. The hymn deals 1d8 sonic damage, with a basic Fortitude save. If a target critically fails the save, it's also [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=66) for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Haunting Hymn
